description: Try stand-up paddleboarding on Aasee, an exciting and refreshing water sport that lets you explore the lake while keeping cool under the sun.

locationInfo.description: Aasee is a popular lake in Münster perfect for water activities like paddleboarding. It's a great way to stay cool during a hot day.
safetyTips: Wear a life jacket for safety.

description: Enjoy a fun and competitive game of outdoor bowling at Schlossgarten, a relaxing park with beautiful views, perfect for a group of friends on a hot summer day.

locationInfo.description: Schlossgarten is a beautiful park with an outdoor bowling alley. It provides a peaceful atmosphere for a fun activity with friends.
safetyTips: Wear comfortable shoes for walking and bowling.
Stay hydrated, especially on hot days.

activity: Tennis Match at Tennis Club Grün-Weiß Münster
description: Enjoy a friendly tennis match at the Tennis Club Grün-Weiß, a great way to have fun and stay active while beating the heat of a sunny day.

locationInfo.description: Tennis Club Grün-Weiß offers well-maintained courts where you can play singles or doubles with friends while enjoying the warm summer weather.
safetyTips: Apply sunscreen to protect your skin.

description: Challenge your friends to a round of mini golf at Freizeitpark Fiedler, a fun and relaxing way to spend time outdoors while enjoying the summer sun.

locationInfo.description: Freizeitpark Fiedler offers an exciting mini golf course surrounded by green spaces, perfect for a friendly competition with friends.
safetyTips: Take a break and hydrate often on hot days.

description: Cool down while challenging yourself with bouldering at Bloc Haus, a climbing gym where you can test your strength and skills on various climbing walls.

locationInfo.description: Bloc Haus provides a great indoor environment for bouldering, offering various climbing walls that will keep you engaged while staying out of the sun.
safetyTips: Use proper climbing shoes for safety.
Warm-up before starting to prevent injury.
